Broaden Your Horizon In Crown Hill University

Crown-Hill University is saddled with the responsibility of promoting knowledge driven solutions through teaching, learning, research and character development driven by integrated information and communication technology facilities, and more.

Vision

To be a knowledge driven institution using the instrumentality of teaching, learning, research and character development for nation building.

Mission

To promote knowledge driven solutions through teaching, learning, research and character development driven by integrated information and communication technology facilities

Our Core Values

Service, Probity, Enterprise, Accountability, and Knowledge (SPEAK)

Crown Hill University Emerges Second Position (KWEPA Ranking)

The result of the recent assessment by the Kwara State Environmental Protection Agency, (KWEPA) across the tertiary institutions in State, has indicated that our Crown-Hill University was ranked as the second most Hygiene University
